test_message: I have a 2-hour commute followed by 3 hours of back-to-back lectures. What wellness reminders should I get?

hydration_reminders.reason: Start of commute; hydrate before long travel.
Midway through commute; reduce dehydration due to travel.
Lecture session start; ensure hydration for optimal focus.
Midway through lectures; prevent fatigue and maintain alertness.

rest_recommendations.reason: Short recharge break after intensive lecture block.
